name: Space Slayer (Hexnite, AdamJRidland99, George Osh, Ghalleon, Kman0115, ProfsrX, Grimlock421)
name_original: Space Slayer (Hexnite, AdamJRidland99, George Osh, Ghalleon, Kman0115, ProfsrX, Grimlock421)
description:
Space Slayer is a 3D Top Down Action game created for Mini Jame Gam 11. The theme was "Delivery" and this jam required us to make use of a special object which was "A Sword." We created version 1.0 in about 60 hours.
